pages.text: Mulina lya Allah, Jwaukoto wejinji, Jwachanasa channope
Lumbili losope lwene alapikwe Allah, M'mbuje jwa iwumbe yosope
Kwele Jikape tukwagalagatila, soni Kwele Jikape tukwawenda chikamuchisyo
Litala lya awala wanya wamwapele chindimba, ngawaga wawatumbililidwe (awala wawaimanyi yakuona nikuileka), kapena wawasokonechele (awala wawailesile yakuona ligongo lya ujinga ni kupotela)
